name: L'Aile des Disparus / Wing of The Lost Ones
name_original: L'Aile des Disparus / Wing of The Lost Ones
description:
Hello here!
It's a Renpy game made in 48h made for Luddum Dare 41, originally written in French (with English translation, check the "Préférences" screen!).

Written by Léo Boudoin and Matthieu Riboulot.
Song of part 3 by Guillaume Faguet. Additional sound effects and music 1, 2_1, 2_2 and 4 from https://www.zapsplat.com
